summary: Project with Google Analytics 4 (GA4) tracking integrated via gtag.js snippet (Measurement ID: G-73VJ1TQ3D7) added to all pages.
architectural_notes: Google Analytics 4 (GA4) gtag.js snippet with Measurement ID G-73VJ1TQ3D7 is placed immediately after the <head> element on every page.

existing_features.title: Insert the Google Analytics 4 gtag.js snippet (Measurement ID: G-73VJ1TQ3D7) into frontend/index.html immediately after the opening <head> tag. Ensure only one instance of the tag exists in the file.
